function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited adoption and application of 5G technology due to challenges in network structure and lack of application scenarios.","Impact":"Delayed realization of the potential benefits of 5G in business and society, including for pandemic control.","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to identify and address the challenges in 5G technology, and promoting the development of practical application scenarios.","Technologies":"Advanced networking technologies, including 5G infrastructure and application development.","People":"Scholars, researchers, and technology developers.","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, and government organizations."},{"Description":"Inadequate attention to 5G's social and business values due to focus on technological aspects and lack of commercial usage.","Impact":"Missed opportunities to leverage 5G for pandemic prevention and control, and other social and business benefits.","Mitigation":"Promoting awareness of the potential social and business values of 5G, and encouraging the exploration of practical applications in pandemic prevention and control.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring systems, and other 5G-enabled healthcare technologies.","People":"Scholars, healthcare professionals, and business leaders.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and industry stakeholders."}]}
